TEXT.TITLE: VERSATILE TO SELL UNIT TO VICON
TEXT.BODY: <Versatile Corp> said it agreed in principle to sell its Alberta-based Versatile Noble Cultivators Co division to Vicon Inc, of Ontario, for undisclosed terms. The division manufactures tillage and spraying equipment. Reuter
